reviews.text:
Have been regular customer, but today staff tell me that 3 meat is unable to mix with 2 veg in one box, where we have been able to all along. Include rice $9 but today we have to pay for $16.we want to eat fresh even 2 person eat cant finish the food and so wasted balance alot.

Right now because have to purchase extra, resulted in extra food wastage.

Its so disappointing.

I recently bought “Bingtanghulu” from Andy, and the experience was fantastic! The selection was great, and Andy was incredibly helpful in guiding me to choose the best options. The candy was fresh, delicious, and beautifully packaged. Andy’s friendly and attentive service made the whole process enjoyable. I’ll definitely be coming back for more and highly recommend buying “Bingtanghulu” from Andy!

Omg I like how they were selling classic Chinese street food like tanghulu and fried food and FIFTY CENTS ICE CREAM!!!! Tastes milky and so worth!!! I wish other Scarlett outlets were like this!!

The staff are so nice too and let you sample some stuff.
Super misleading, instead of selling as mentioned, only sold the buns in packages.

At the Kovan MRT Station then Exit C then you walk to the staircase then walking to the left side if you reaching there, walking to the entrance straight go to the elevator to the Scarlett is easy to found it is very big.I going in on my left hand side have some is the food that i can ate but i didn't brought it because i wanted to brought the KFC at the Chinatown Point of 5 piece of chicken the price is $9.95 is the last day of the Date:4.6.2024 on Tuesday and i went there is because i wanted to brought the Art Lane, Level 2 of 2 For $20.00 is the Diamond Art Fan.I feeling of the working there Scarlett staff is quite good because she is in the bottom counter so i said: i wanted to pay the money then she is service me so i said she is quite good and she talking is quite courtesy if wanted to gave the point is 75/50, i thought she is from the China.
